text: I vot, Moisey skazal svoyemu narodu: "Narod moy! Vy sdelali zlo sebe samim tem, chto sdelali sebe tel'tsa; potomu s raskayaniyem obratites' k sozdatelyu vashemu, ili ubeyte sebya samikh: eto budet dlya vas luchshe pred sozdatelem vashim", i On szhalitsya o vas kayushchikhsya. Ibo On blagopreklonen k kayushchimsya, miloserd
